You know the phrase: ‚Äúdon‚Äôt boil the ocean.‚Äù Everyone‚Äôs said it in some overly ambitious meeting. It‚Äôs good advice in normal times. It keeps teams focused. It prevents scope creep. But we are no longer in normal times, and I think it‚Äôs time to retire saying it.
